mapper.select:
select DISTINCT t.CUST_ID custId, t.MERCHANT_CODE merchantCode, t.CUST_NAME mchName, t.CUST_NAME mchShortName, t.categoryType , t.CUST_ADD address, l.MOBILE customerPhone, t.AGENT_NAME linkman, l.MOBILE phone, l.EMAIL email, t.AGENT_NAME operator, t.mchRole , t.CERTIFY_NO operatorIdno, t.BUSINESS_LICENSE linenceNo, 'NATIONAL_LEGAL' certifcateType, 'LEGAL_PERSON' contractsType, t.province, t.city, t.country, p1.SCAN_COPY_PATH idCardPath, p2.SCAN_COPY_PATH businessPath, pc1.column_value accountNo, -- 结算卡号 pc2.column_value accountName, -- 结算户名 pc3.column_value CNAPS -- 联行号 from td_cust_info t JOIN td_certificate_auth A ON a.AUTH_ID = t.AUTH_ID AND A.CERTIFICATE_STATE = '0' JOIN td_cust_scan_copy p1 ON t.AUTH_ID = p1.AUTH_ID and p1.CERTIFY_TYPE = '04' JOIN td_cust_scan_copy p2 ON t.AUTH_ID = p2.AUTH_ID and p2.CERTIFY_TYPE = '02' JOIN td_login_user_info l ON t.CUST_ID = l.CUST_ID JOIN bms_protocol_content c ON t.CUST_ID = c.cust_id and c.`status` = 'VALID' JOIN bms_protocol_column pc1 ON c.id = pc1.protocol_id and pc1.column_code = 'bankCardNo' -- 结算卡号 JOIN bms_protocol_column pc2 ON c.id = pc2.protocol_id and pc2.column_code = 'bankCardName' -- 结算户名 JOIN bms_protocol_column pc3 ON c.id = pc3.protocol_id and pc3.column_code = 'CNAPS' -- 联行号 left JOIN td_merchant_filing_info m ON t.MERCHANT_CODE = m.merchant_code where t.MERCHANT_FLAG in ('0','2') and t.categoryType is not NULL and l.STATE = '00'
and t.MERCHANT_CODE = #{merchantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update.foreach: update td_cust_info t SET t.filing_status = '01' WHERE t.MERCHANT_CODE = #{item.merchantCode}

mapper.select: select t.CUST_ID, IF(mobile.column_value = 'NULL',NULL,mobile.column_value) mobile, IF(h5.column_value = 'NULL',NULL,h5.column_value) h5, IF(pc.column_value = 'NULL',NULL,pc.column_value) pc, IF(h5_t.column_value = 'NULL',NULL,h5_t.column_value) h5t, IF(onecode.column_value = 'NULL',NULL,onecode.column_value) onecode from td_cust_info t JOIN bms_protocol_content c ON t.CUST_ID = c.cust_id and c.`status` = 'VALID' left JOIN bms_protocol_column h5 ON c.id = h5.protocol_id and h5.column_code = 'h5.gateway.pay_rate' left JOIN bms_protocol_column pc ON c.id = pc.protocol_id and pc.column_code = 'pc.gateway.pay_rate' left JOIN bms_protocol_column h5_t ON c.id = h5_t.protocol_id and h5_t.column_code = 'h5_t.gateway.pay_rate' left JOIN bms_protocol_column mobile ON c.id = mobile.protocol_id and mobile.column_code = 'mobile.plugin.pay_rate' left JOIN bms_protocol_column onecode ON c.id = onecode.protocol_id and onecode.column_code = 'onecode.coll.pay_rate' where t.merchant_code = #{merchantCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT c.channl_id, c.channl_code, c.channl_name FROM td_filing_channl_info c
where c.status='ENABLE'

SELECT i.* FROM td_cust_info t JOIN td_merchant_filing_info i ON t.MERCHANT_CODE = i.merchant_code WHERE i.channel_no = #{channelNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR} AND i.merchant_code = #{merchantCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} AND i.filing_status = '00' AND i.audit_status = '00'
AND ( i.mch_role = '0' OR i.mch_role = '1' )
AND i.mch_role = '0'
AND i.mch_role = '1'

SELECT tb.PROVINCE_ID FROM tb_heilpay_province tb WHERE tb.PROVINCE_NAME LIKE CONCAT( '%', ( SELECT t.PROVINCE_NAME FROM tb_sp_province t WHERE t.PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ), '%' )
SELECT tb.city_id FROM tb_helipay_city tb WHERE tb.city_name LIKE CONCAT( '%', ( SELECT t.city_name FROM tb_sp_city t WHERE t.city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ), '%' )
SELECT tb.area_id FROM tb_helipay_area tb WHERE tb.area_name LIKE CONCAT( '%', ( SELECT t.area_name FROM tb_sp_area t WHERE t.area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ), '%' )
SELECT * FROM category_code_info t WHERE t.categoryId IN ( SELECT inf.categoryType FROM td_cust_info inf WHERE inf.MERCHANT_CODE = #{merchantId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
SELECT * FROM category_code_info_helipay t WHERE t.categoryId = #{categoryId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
